column5: Harry.. please accept our deepest condolences from my family.. Your Father sounded like a Great man.. you will miss him dearly but as always... Remember all the great time you and your Mother and family had with him... He is at rest now
My condolences to you and your family.Sounds Like you have had great years together.MTP
my condolences pikehunter and your family.

Thank you everybody for your heartfelt wishes. We made all the arrangements yesterday for his funeral. It was a long tough day.  I glanced at this thread for a moment yesterday but it was too difficult to continue reading then. This morning it is a little easier to do.  Below is one picture I came across of my father and I in Florida with a fish he had caught (After seeing the enlargement of it I see another fish in his left hand.) on a charter fishing boat we had been out on. Later today we will be looking threw my parents albums for pictures for a tribute at the funeral home.  Thanks again to everyone, your comments mean very much to us.
My condolences on the loss of your dad Pikehunter.  That was a great tribute to him that you posted.
My sincerest condolences to you and your family.
My condolances to you and your family.

Harry, my deepest condolences on the passing of your father. Reading your tribute, your father had a good life.  Keep all your memories in your heart, and Dad will always be with you.  Regards,  John and Diane Ross
You words are powerful describing a great man.  His life is very interesting and meaningful to read about.  My condolences.
Sorry to hear of your loss.  My sympathies.
My condolences to you and your family. Jeff
Sorry to hear about your father, remember the good times, the lessons taught and learned and you always have him with you.
So sorry for your loss Harry. You wrote a nice tribute and thanks for sharing the pictures. Be well and get back out on the water ...and catch him a big one.  Wayne and Leah
My condolences PH.  You wrote a great tribute, just finished reading it.
Sorry for your loss. That was a lovely tribute.
My deepest condolences.  Sounds like your Dad was a great guy!!! Take care!
My condolences to you and your family, Harry.
Sorry to hear of your loss frined. He sounds like a great sports man and gentlemen.  Thoughts and prayers are with you and your family.
My sympathies andcondolences
Another prayer lifted up for you and your family.  Sorry to hear of your loss.
Pikehunter, my condolences. You have written a beautiful tribute which in and of itself probably says a lot about your father. God Bless you and your family.
Hang on to those memories.....they'll help you through.
I'm sorry for your loss. He is a young looking 86 in that picture.  Hold on to your memories.
Sincere heartfelt condolences Harry. That was a wonderful tribute to someone who must have been a very special man.  John..
My Condolences to you and your Family
So sorry for your loss.....  He sounds like a great man, and that was a very nice tribute you've given him here.  dk
Sorry for your loss!!!!
Sorry to hear of your loss and condolences to you and your family.
My condolences to you and your family on your loss.
Very sorry to hear of your loss Pikehunter.  My condolences to you and your family.  Your Dad would be honoured by your tribute I'm sure.
Sorry, for your loss.  What a great tribute to a father
Our deepest condolences toyou and your family.  A
Its always tough to loose a parent.. My condolences...
Sorry to hear of your loss. My condolences to you and your family.
You had a lot of great things to say about a great man.  My thoughts are with you Harry.
Sorry for your loss!

It is hard to find words to write that will convey what it is that is felt after reading your post... Losing a parent, a mentor a guide ... someone who you loved unconditionally is heart renching... may the memories of every moment you shared fill your heart and balance your loss.  My condolences to you and your family  Jen

Pikehunter,  Our condolences to you and your family...........I know you will miss your father and you will always remember the many great experiences you shared with him.  You are in our prayers.  Best regards, Sam and family.
My condolences.
Sorry to hear of your loss. My condolances to you and your family.  Mike
Harry, my Dad and I wish you deepest condolences.  Corey
What a beautiful tribute, I am sure your dad would be very proud!  Peace be with you and your family.  Forever in your heart!
